tooltip.vherbalism.birch_sap.tooltip: Helps soothe and treat Yellowcough when eaten.
tooltip.vherbalism.bindweed.tooltip: Helps promote healing in broken bones when placed within a splint. Plants Bindweed.
tooltip.vherbalism.borage.tooltip: Dampens fevers, helps with stomach pain and tight chests when eaten. Plants Borage.
tooltip.vherbalism.broom.tooltip: Can be mashed into Broom Poultice. Plants Broom.
tooltip.vherbalism.broom_poultice.toolti: Helps promote healing in broken bones and wounds when applied to/ around the affected area.
tooltip.vherbalism.burdock_root.tooltip: Soothes sores, bites, and other minor afflictions when chewed and applied to affected areas.
tooltip.vherbalism.blackberry_leaves.too: Can be mashed into Blackberry Leaf Poultice.
tooltip.vherbalism.blackberry_poultice.t: Helps soothe the pain of bee stings when applied to the affected area.
tooltip.vherbalism.burnet.tooltip: Can be chewed for strength when traveling. Plants Burnet.
tooltip.vherbalism.catchweed.tooltip: Used in poultices to prevent them from being easily rubbed off from the skin. Plants Catchweed.
tooltip.vherbalism.celadine.tooltip: Can be mashed into Celadine Juice. Plants Celadine.
tooltip.vherbalism.celadine_juice.toolti: Can be dripped into damaged/ injured eyes to help with healing.
tooltip.vherbalism.camomile.tooltip: Can be chewed for strength when traveling. Plants Camomile.
tooltip.vherbalism.cobweb.tooltip: Can be used in poultices or directly on wounds to help seal them.
tooltip.vherbalism.chervil.tooltip: Can soothe infections or bellyaches when chewed. Plants Chervil.
tooltip.vherbalism.coltsfoot_bundle.tool: Can soothe lung-illnesses and coughs when chewed. Plants Coltsfoot.
tooltip.vherbalism.comfrey_leaf.tooltip: Helps soothe pain from broken bones, other injuries and ailments when chewed or wrapped around them. Plants Comfrey
tooltip.vherbalism.comfrey_root.tooltip: Helps soothe pain from broken bones, other injuries and ailments when chewed. Plants Comfrey.
tooltip.vherbalism.daisy_leaves.tooltip: Soothes pain from aching joints when chewed. Plants Daisy.
tooltip.vherbalism.dandelion_leaves.tool: Helps bring down fevers when chewed. Plants Dandelion.
tooltip.vherbalism.dandelion_root.toolti: Treats Saffron Poisoning when chewed. Plants Dandelion.
tooltip.vherbalism.dock_leaf.tooltip: Soothes pain from minor wounds. Plants Dock.
tooltip.vherbalism.elderberry_leaves.too: Can be mashed into Elderberry Leaf Poultice.
tooltip.vherbalism.elderberry_poultice.t: Helps soothe the pain of sprains and sore muscles.
tooltip.vherbalism.fennel_stalk.tooltip: Soothes pain from general aches. Plants Fennel.
tooltip.vherbalism.feverfew_bundle.toolt: Brings down fevers when chewed. Plants Feverfew.
tooltip.vherbalism.garlic.tooltip: Soothes inflammation in joints. Plants Garlic.
tooltip.vherbalism.goldenrod_bundle.tool: Can be mashed into Goldenrod Poultice. Plants Goldenrod.
tooltip.vherbalism.goldenrod_poultice.to: Cleans and helps wounds with healing.
tooltip.vherbalism.horsetail_bundle.tool: Can be mashed into Horsetail Poultice. Plants Horsetail.
tooltip.vherbalism.ivy_leaf.tooltip: Can bind things together. Plants Ivy.
tooltip.vherbalism.juniperberry.tooltip: Soothes bellyaches, coughs and shortness of breath. Can be used in Topical Poultice. Plants Juniper Bush.
tooltip.vherbalism.bay_laurel.tooltip: Can bind herbs or be used to hold honey and other liquids. Plants Bay Laurel.
tooltip.vherbalism.lavender_bundle.toolt: Hides the unforgiving scent of death when inhaled. Can be used to soothe wounds. Plants Lavender.
tooltip.vherbalism.bright_eye_bundle.too: Mixed into a poultice with Lovage. Plants Bright Eye.
tooltip.vherbalism.lovage_bundle.tooltip: Mixed into a poultice with Bright Eye. Plants Lovage.
tooltip.vherbalism.mallow.tooltip: Soothes bellyaches and coughs. Plants Mallow.
tooltip.vherbalism.marigold_bundle.toolt: Can be mashed into Marigold Poultice. Plants Marigold.
tooltip.vherbalism.marigold_poultice.too: Helps treat infection in wounds and inflammation.
tooltip.vherbalism.mint_leaves.tooltip: Can be rubbed on dead bodies to help with the putrid stench. Plants Mint.
tooltip.vherbalism.moss_clump.tooltip: Can be placed, with firm pressure, over a new wound to stop the bleeding.
tooltip.vherbalism.dried_oak_leaves: Can be chewed to slow infection progression in wounds.
tooltip.vherbalism.poppy_seeds: Can be chewed to help soothe restless sleep, stress or mild pain.
tooltip.vherbalism.raspberry_leaves.tool: Can be used to stop bleeding and soothe pain.
tooltip.vherbalism.parsley_leaves.toolti: Can be eaten to prevent milk production or help with belly aches. Plants Parsley.
tooltip.vherbalism.ragweed_bundle.toolti: Can be chewed for strength when traveling. Plants Ragweed.
tooltip.vherbalism.ragwort_leaves.toolti: Can be chewed to help with mild pain. Plants Ragwort.
tooltip.vherbalism.rhubarb_leaf.tooltip: Can be used to wrap items. Plants Rhubarb.
tooltip.vherbalism.rosemary_bundle.toolt: Can be placed on a dead cat to prepare it for a funeral. Plants Rosemary.
tooltip.vherbalism.rush_bundle.tooltip: Can help bind broken or fractured bones. Plants Rush.
tooltip.vherbalism.sorrel_leaves.tooltip: Quenches thirst and builds up appetites. Plants Sorrel.
tooltip.vherbalism.stinging_nettle_leave: Can treat infection when chewed. Rinse with water first. Plants Stinging Nettle.
